I like predictions -it let's us do real testing, and validate what works, a=
nd invalidate what doesn't (what you called below the "the cut and try meth=
od, see what works").

I have added this prediction to my calendar, and wil=
l remember to remind the group of it when the 17th passes, to help with tha=
t validation/invalidation process.

purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

ail.com>

=C2=A0



  


    
      
              
        [Attachment(s) from =
Frank Sumption included below]
        
      
      =C2=A0Starts out "next=
 month the 17th" Don't know what that is, but I've heard it several times i=
n various recordings. But wait,=C2=A0this is AM, where's the usual interfer=
ence?=C2=A0 At 5 seconds "Wait---Navy", maybe that has to do with=C2=A0the =
old disaster. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0Oh crap! I forgot to ask for the scientfic apr=
oval before posting. Admittedly, I was being mean spirited on purpose, I'm =
not going to allow some science dork to brow=C2=A0beat me into submission. =
I believe the home page of EVP-ITC says something to the effect that we don=
't follow science, this is for sharing information, and using the cut and t=
ry method, see what works.=C2=A0I know everyone hears different, and that's=
 ok, that does not invalidate this stuff. My apologies for ruffling feather=
s. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S
